name: Stop Thief
overview: Stop Thief is a 1-player memory game for the VIC-20. You witnessed a robbery at the Westland Bank. You caught a glimpse of the robber, and must help the police. The player is briefly shown a picture of the culprit. The player must choose the correct facial features from a number of menus to correctly identify the them. The player can choose to be shown additional clues as the puzzle progresses. There are 4 skill levels, which effect how long and often the robber is shown.
